LocaleLayout.title: Mindshift - Transform Your Career with Online Courses
LocaleLayout.description: Learn new skills and advance your career with expert-led online courses. Join thousands of students mastering programming, design, business, and more on Mindshift.
LocaleLayout.keywords: online courses, learning platform, skill development, career growth, programming courses, design courses, business courses, professional development, e-learning

Manifest.name: Mindshift - Transform Your Career with Online Courses
Manifest.description: Learn new skills and advance your career with expert-led online courses. Join thousands of students mastering programming, design, business, and more on Mindshift.

upload.text: Drop your files here or <action>click to upload</action>

toast.manyFiles: Too many files, please upload a maximum of 1 files.
toast.tooLarge: File too large, please upload a file less than 5MB.
toast.presignedUrl: Failed to generate presigned URL, please try again.

signIn.success: Signed in with GitHub, you will be redirected ...
signIn.error: Failed to sign in with GitHub, please try again later.

signOut.error: Failed to sign out, please try again later.

agreement.text: By signing up, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

Footer.text: The future of online education. Discover a new way to learn with our modern, interactive learning management system.

HomePage.title: Elevate your Learning Experience
HomePage.description: Discover a new way to learn with our modern, interactive learning management system. Take control of your learning experience, track your progress, and stay up-to-date with the latest information.

keyFeatures.title: Comprehensive Courses
keyFeatures.description: Access a wide range of carefully curated courses designed by industry experts.

keyFeatures.title: Interactive Learning
keyFeatures.description: Engage with interactive content, quizzes, and assignments to enhance your learning experience.

keyFeatures.title: Progress Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Monitor your progress and achievements with detailed analytics and personalized dashboards.

keyFeatures.title: Community Support
keyFeatures.description: Join a vibrant community of learners and instructors to collaborate and share knowledge.

TeacherCoursesPage.title: Your Courses
TeacherCoursesPage.subtitle: Here you can create and manage your courses.

empty.title: No Courses
empty.description: You have not created any courses yet.

signups.title: Registered users on the platform
signups.description: Indicates how many users have created accounts, regardless of activity.

customers.title: Users who have enrolled in courses
customers.description: Reflects users who have completed a purchase or joined a course.

courses.title: Available courses on the platform
courses.description: Shows the number of active and published courses users can access.

lessons.title: Total learning content available
lessons.description: Represents all lessons included across published courses.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.description: Provide some basic information about your course.

title.label: Title
title.min: Title must be at least 3 characters
title.max: Title must be less than 100 characters

description.label: Description
description.min: Description must be at least 3 characters
description.max: Description must be less than 1000 characters

duration.label: Duration (in hours)
duration.min: Duration must be at least 1 hour
duration.max: Duration must be less than 500 hours

smallDescription.label: Small Description
smallDescription.min: Small description must be at least 3 characters
smallDescription.max: Small description must be less than 200 characters

slug.label: Slug
slug.min: Slug must be at least 3 characters
slug.max: Slug must be less than 100 characters

edit.alert: You need to make changes in the course

basicInfo.title: Basic Info
basicInfo.description: Provide some basic information about your course.

courseStructure.title: Course Structure
courseStructure.description: Define the structure of your course.

chapter.title: Create a new Chapter
chapter.description: What would you like to call this chapter?

lesson.title: Create a new Lesson
lesson.description: What would you like to call this lesson?

chapter.title: Are you sure you want to delete this chapter?
chapter.description: This action cannot be undone. All lessons within this chapter will also be deleted.

lesson.title: Are you sure you want to delete this lesson?

DeleteCoursePage.title: Delete Course
DeleteCoursePage.description: Are you sure you want to delete this course? This action cannot be undone.

title.label: Title
title.min: Title must be at least 3 characters
title.max: Title must be less than 100 characters

LessonForm.description: Configure your lesson. You can add a video, image, or both.

title.label: Title
title.min: Title must be at least 3 characters

StudentCoursesPage.title: Explore Courses
StudentCoursesPage.description: Discover a wide range of carefully curated courses designed by industry experts. From programming to design, we have something for everyone.

empty.title: No Courses
empty.description: You haven't enrolled in any courses yet. Start learning today!

parameters.title: Access to all chapters and lessons

moneyBack.title: 30-day Money-Back Guarantee
moneyBack.description: If you're not satisfied with your purchase, we'll refund your money within 30 days.

success.title: Payment Success
success.description: Your payment was successful. You can now continue to the course.

error.title: Payment Failed
error.description: No worries! You will be charged the full amount later. Please try again.

enroll.title: Enrolled Courses
enroll.description: View and manage your enrolled courses.

empty.title: No Courses
empty.description: You haven't enrolled in any courses yet. Start learning today!

available.title: Available Courses
available.description: Discover a wide range of carefully curated courses designed by industry experts. From programming to design, we have something for everyone.

empty.title: No Available Courses
empty.description: There are currently no available courses. Check back later for new courses!

empty.title: No lessons added yet
